Interface ISyncRepository

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Repositories
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Repository interface for synchronization state and history. Persists sync task configurations, statistics, and error history.

public interface ISyncRepository : IRepository<SyncState>
